import React,{useState} from 'react' import Homepage from './Homepage' import Search from './Search' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {useAlert} from 'react-alert' import {logout} from '../Store/Actions/authActions' const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {user,loading} = useSelector(state => state.auth) const alert = useAlert() const Logout =() =>{ alert.success('You have successfully Logged Out') dispatch(logout()) } return (
Cart 2 {user ? (
{ user.user && user.user.name}
{user.user && user.user.role !== 'admin' ?( Orders ): ( Dashboard )} Logout Profile
):(Login)}
) } export default Header
